 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרַץ‎</span>] **verb** ==nip, pinch== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרַץ‎</span> ***cut*** dough, ***compress*** lips, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶרֶץ‎</span> ***piece of bread***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Karâƒu***</u></abbr>, ***nip off***, ***gnaw***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pinch***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***incise***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***nail*** [see also Biblical Aramaic]; compare [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>35 f.</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְרְצועַֿיִן‎</span> [[Ps.35.19|Ps 35:19]] ***let them not pinch the eye***, i.e. wink maliciously, so ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹרֵץ צ‎</span> [[Prov.10.10|Prov 10:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעֵינוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Prov.6.13|Prov 6:13]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂפָתָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Prov.16.30|Prov 16:30]] ***pinching his lips*** (i.e. compressing, as in Late Hebrew, or biting, gnawing, compare Assyrian). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵחֹמֶר קֹרַצְתִּי‎</span> [[Job.33.6|Job 33:6]] ***from clay I was nipped off*** (compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‰i‰a i‡tariƒ***</u></abbr>, ***he nipped off clay***, to form Eabani).
